# fivetran_connection_config (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `connection_id` (String) The unique identifier for the connection within the Fivetran system.

### Optional

- `auth` (String) Connection auth config in Json format, following [Fivetran API endpoint contract](https://fivetran.com/docs/rest-api/api-reference/connections/create-connection) for `auth` field
- `config` (String) Connection config in Json format, following [Fivetran API endpoint contract](https://fivetran.com/docs/rest-api/api-reference/connections/create-connection) for `config` field
- `run_setup_tests` (Boolean) Whether to run setup tests when applying configuration. Defaults to true. This is a plan-only attribute and will not be stored in state.
- `trust_certificates` (Boolean) Whether to automatically trust SSL certificates. Defaults to false. This is a plan-only attribute and will not be stored in state.
- `trust_fingerprints` (Boolean) Whether to automatically trust SSH fingerprints. Defaults to false. This is a plan-only attribute and will not be stored in state.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier for this configuration (same as connection_id).
